chargeHist.descr: Knowingly Violate a Domestic Abuse Order

result.execSummary:
The defendant Leroy D Bradley was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Undergo any counseling per agent. No contact with Circus World, Baraboo without agent's approval.  Submit to DNA sample.    If probation/extended supervision revoked or discharges with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Leroy D Bradley

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Leroy D Bradley in court with attorney Richard G. Davis.  Jennifer Harper appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State moves to amend to mis. bail jumping.   State gives recommendation.  Attorney Davis agrees.  Defendant agrees and understands.   No Contest Plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court. finds Defendant guilty.  State reads victim statement into the record.  State gives basis for agreement.  Court withholds sentence.
Count 1:
24 months Probation, concurrent
Undergo any counseling per agent.
No contact with Circus World, Baraboo w/out agent's approval.
Submit to DNA sample.  
$243.00 costs, $200.00 DNA surcharge & Supervision Fees (PAID THRU PROBATION)
Paperwork handed in court.
Back on the record.  Need to address bond.   $500 Signature bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows: No contact w/J.B.; Booking.

Defendant Leroy D Bradley in court with attorney Richard G. Davis.  Jennifer M. Harper appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty. Harper states DE previously waived right to counsel to get offer and at that tiime rejected State's offer.  Atty. Davis concurs.    Court enters Not Guilty plea- Set for Trial br. 3.  Bond continues.

Defendant Leroy D Bradley in court.  Jennifer Harper appeared for the State of Wisconsin from Richland Co by phone.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Advised rights to an attorney.  File set for pre-trial conference/return date.  Previous $150.00 cash bond continued.  State notes DE contacted her earlier to see about getting an offer.  DE waives counsel to get offer from DA.  Court questions DE on counsel waiver/accepts.  DA to send offer to DE.  Special bond conditions as follows:  No contact w/J.B. if that wasn't already the condition on the bond.  Return date scheduled for June 24, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
